page.title: 05CHESSINGTON ZOO (3)
page.content:
{INTERVIEW WITH MRS.ROWE OF THE ZOO {STAFF (conducted by the pupils of {Ellingham Primary School): { HISTORY OF THE ZOO
The zoo & funfair opened in 1931, and the complex stands on a 65 acre site excluding land purchased which is not yet fully integrated into the zoo.When Madame Tussaud's bought the business 2 years ago, a major investment scheme was launched; Â£4.5 million has been spent on enlarging and improving the enclosures. A new ape house opened last year. {ACQUISITIONS }We would like to acquire some okapi (a type of antelope), since these are very rare. We've just bought 3 lemurs & some palm cockatoos.
